Summary: look like stars were moving south to north
trends: There have been no other sightings in Berkley
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsit started while i was at ft.lyons correc.facilty 2008\2010 while looking at the nite sky i would see certain stars move in circles or up and down or left to right or right to left! i all so saw things that i call flopy discs that look like pancakes moveing in the wind.this all happend at nite.this would happen every nite .the number of stars moveing at the same time varied.after my release in 2010 i returned to denver.on my first nite out i was seeing the same thing! it has continued to the present.with the exception of the 10\17 sighting of the stars? moveing in a different way and that was in loose groups of 2-3 from south to north.
